articles.author: Orrin Singh
articles.title: Mozambican ‘kidnapping kingpin’ is a transport businessman: lawyer - TimesLIVE
articles.description: The Mozambican man alleged to be a kidnapping kingpin is a transport businessman who has permanent residence in South Africa.

articles.title: Beninese vote in 1st legislative polls since return of opposition - Africanews English
articles.description: Over six million Beninese were called to elect 109 MPs on Sunday (Jan. 08). The election marks the return of opposition candidates after a four-year absence.
articles.content:

articles.title: South Africa deny Australia series sweep as Sydney Test ends in draw - The Guardian
articles.description: Sydney Test ends in a draw with South Africa finishing day five on 106 for 2 as Australia claim the series 2-0 after victories in Brisbane and Melbourne

articles.title: The 2022 Monkeypox Epidemic and What Has Led to the Current State of the Disease in the US: A Systematic Review - Cureus
articles.description: Monkeypox virus (MPOX) is a zoonotic disease in humans. It is similar genetically to its virus family member, smallpox. This virus has been studied since the 1970s. The virus remains endemic to the Congo and West African regions, but non-endemic spreads have …
